Item.text: Raw Exporter writes all monitored data to the output file in binary format. It supports filtering and allows root protocol to be configured.

Text Exporter applies a selected protocol to monitored data, presents it as a stream of textual fields and writes the output into a UNICODE text file. It supports filtering and allows root protocol to be configured.

Message.value: There was an error during exporting: {error}

Text Exporter has been paused due to disk writing error. Check if there is enough available disk space or for other disk-related errors and either Resume the operation, or remove Text Exporter from the session.
There was an error during export initialization: {error} ({error code})
